EmailTemplate.name: YETI Price List / Dealer Resource Page
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: {!Case.Subject}.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for the call. I am attaching our most current price list.
You can also always access the current price along with marketing materials to use in your store through the Dealer Resources page:
https://dealers.yeti.com
Password is: flippallot
If you have any questions, please let me know.
{!User.CommunityNickname} Account Management Team YETI 512.394.0222 sales@yeti.com yeti.com
